traits.name: (Scout) Hard to Hit
traits.detail: When you are standing and unrestained, attacks against you have disadvantage unless you are adjacent to two or more enemies.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.detail: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Revenge
traits.detail: Belladonna cannot cast Cone of Cold while Zakroth is conscious. Once Zakroth is reduced to 0 hp, Belladonna's AC increases by 3, and she gains the ability to cast Cone of Cold.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Belladonna casts a spell, then makes three attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_  8 (1d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.detail: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 7 (1d4+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Resistance
actions.detail: A creature of Belladonna's choice can add 1d4 to a saving throw they make before the end of Belladonna's next turn.

actions.name: Ice Knife
actions.detail: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 5 (1d10) piercing damage. _Hit or Miss:_ the target and each creature within 5' of it must make a [dc-secondary] DEX save or take 10 (3d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt (3/day)
actions.detail: Each creature in a 120' line must make a [dc-primary] DEX save or take 28 (8d6) lightning damage (half damage on save).

actions.name: Cone of Cold (see Revenge)
actions.detail: Each creature in a 60' cone must make a [dc-primary] CON save or take 36 (8d8) cold damage (half damage on save).
